document_data.name: Alaecathra Shuinrond
document_data.mainbody: '''Alaecathra Shuinrond''' was the abbess of the [[Seekers of the Dawn]] in [[Myth Drannor]] in the [[1370 DR|Year of the Tankard, 1370 DR]].
document_data.Activities: Alaecathra directed the Seekers of the Dawn, a [[Lathander]]ian order devoted to helping adventurers in Myth Drannor. She also took care of the [[Dawnstone]].
document_data.Personality: Alaecathra was a kindly, enthusiastic, yet commanding leader. She had no fear and would die for [[Lathander]] without hesitation.
